definition: to emerge and perish on its own; to run its course (idiom)
self/oneself/from/since/naturally/surely
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
self/oneself/from/since/naturally/surely
to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown

sentences.english: However, that success may have run its course.
sentences.chinese: 然而，这种成功可能会自生自灭。

sentences.english: When you make a mistake you need to correct a mistake, not leave Iraq to its death.
sentences.chinese: 犯了错误就要改正错误，别任由伊拉克自生自灭。

sentences.english: Leave the land alone and allow it to heal our planet.
sentences.chinese: 任由这些土地自生自灭就能治愈我们的星球。

definition: to stand aside and do nothing (idiom)/to take no part in
to avoid a problem by walking away from it/to quit
to let (sb do sth)/to allow/regardless of
to take a laissez-faire attitude
to let sb do whatever they want/to indulge/to give free reins to/to let things slide/to drift aimlessly/laissez-faire
not to hear, not to question (idiom)/to show no interest in sth/uncritical/not in the least concerned
to ignore/to let alone/to indulge
to submit to the will of heaven/to resign oneself to fate/to trust to luck
disaster/harm/scourge/bad person/to damage/to harm/to wreck
to struggle on whilst at death's door (idiom)
(coll.) to cause trouble for sb/to inconvenience
to leave/to abandon
to reap what one has sown (idiom)/to stew in one's own juice
to slaughter/(fig.) to ride roughshod over/to take advantage of (others)
(in such circumstances) there will be no peace/one can never breathe easy
to make oneself scarce/to slip away/to take French leave
pinyin: pai1 pai1 pi4 gu5 zou3 ren2
